nodes.long_description:
Creato per chi ama i giochi da tavolo, All On Board! riporta in vita la magia delle serate di gioco.

Risate, rivalità e la tensione prima di un lancio decisivo: tutto questo ti aspetta in VR/XR. Riunisciti attorno a un tavolo virtuale che sembra reale, ovunque tu sia.

All On Board! ti permette di giocare alle versioni digitali dei tuoi giochi preferiti. Il catalogo include classici gratuiti e titoli con licenza venduti come DLC (solo l’host deve possedere il DLC; gli altri possono unirsi con l’app base).

{1269730997882447}

Ogni gioco è adattato con cura e rispetto per ciò che lo rende unico. Ogni mossa e momento condiviso tra amici prende vita nello spazio virtuale. Non si tratta di sostituire il tavolo, ma di ampliarlo.

{1254770506145506}

- Esperienza VR/XR realistica con controlli intuitivi  
- Solo l’host acquista il titolo con licenza; gli altri si uniscono con l’app base  
- Libreria in espansione con classici gratuiti e titoli con licenza  
- Gioco multipiattaforma e supporto multilingua  
- Modalità solitaria, cooperativa o competitiva  
- Learning Hub (sezione didattica) in ogni gioco  
- Salva e riprendi quando vuoi  

{627190099949374}

Giochi inclusi:  
- Dama, Go, Scacchi e Parcheesi  
- Giochi con il mazzo francese  

Trova altri giocatori su Discord o Telegram e inizia una partita (nessun avversario IA per ora).

All On Board! è sviluppato da uno studio indipendente che ama i giochi da tavolo quanto te, spinto dalla passione, aggiornamenti costanti e un catalogo in crescita.

{786055897409926}
nodes.short_description: Creato per gli amanti dei giochi da tavolo, All On Board! riporta la magia delle serate di gioco in VR/XR. Goditi le versioni adattate dei tuoi titoli preferiti con gli amici, una fisica realistica e un design curato che rendono ogni partita autentica, ovunque tu sia.

nodes.long_description:
Für alle Brettspielfans: All On Board! bringt die Magie gemeinsamer Spieleabende in VR/XR zurück.

Lachen, Rivalität, die Stille vor einem entscheidenden Wurf – all das erlebst du hier. Triff dich mit Freunden an einem virtuellen Tisch, der sich echt anfühlt, egal wie weit ihr voneinander entfernt seid.

All On Board! lässt dich digitale Versionen deiner Lieblingsspiele erleben. Die Bibliothek enthält kostenlose Klassiker und lizenzierte Titel, die separat als DLC verkauft werden (nur der Host muss den DLC besitzen; andere können mit der Basis-App beitreten).

{1048192680799594}

Jedes Spiel wird mit Liebe zum Detail umgesetzt. Jeder Wurf, jede Bewegung und jeder Moment mit Freunden wird in VR lebendig. Es geht nicht darum, den Tisch zu ersetzen, sondern ihn zu erweitern.

{770058845442529}

- Realistische VR/XR-Erfahrung mit intuitiver Steuerung  
- Nur der Host kauft den DLC; andere spielen mit der Basis-App  
- Wachsende Bibliothek mit Klassikern und lizenzierten Spielen  
- Plattformübergreifendes Spielen und Mehrsprachenunterstützung  
- Solo-, Koop- oder Wettkampfmodus  
- Learning Hub (Lernbereich) in jedem Spiel  
- Speicher- und Fortsetzungsfunktion jederzeit  

{1825960721322777}

Klassische Spiele:  
- Dame, Go, Schach und Parcheesi  
- Französische Kartenspiele  

Finde andere Spieler auf Discord oder Telegram und starte eine Runde (noch keine KI-Gegner).

All On Board! wird von einem unabhängigen Studio entwickelt, das Brettspiele so liebt wie du – mit Leidenschaft, Updates und einer wachsenden Auswahl großartiger Titel.

{1458220045415720}
nodes.short_description: Entwickelt für Brettspielfans: All On Board! bringt die Magie der Spieleabende in VR/XR zurück. Genieße angepasste Versionen deiner Lieblingstitel mit Freunden, realistischer Physik und durchdachtem Design – fast wie am echten Spieltisch, egal wo du bist.

nodes.long_description:
Conçu pour les passionnés de jeux de société, All On Board! fait revivre la magie des soirées de jeux.

Les rires, la rivalité, la tension avant un lancer décisif… tout est là en VR/XR. Réunissez-vous autour d’une table virtuelle qui paraît réelle, où que vous soyez.

All On Board! vous permet de jouer aux versions numériques de vos jeux préférés. Sa bibliothèque réunit des classiques gratuits et des titres sous licence vendus en DLC (seul l’hôte doit posséder le DLC; les autres rejoignent avec l’application de base).

{1457869152034657}

Chaque jeu est adapté avec soin et respect pour ce qui le rend unique. Chaque mouvement et moment partagé entre amis prend vie dans l’espace virtuel. Il ne s’agit pas de remplacer la table, mais de l’élargir.

{1463732271293563}

- Expérience VR/XR réaliste avec commandes intuitives  
- Seul l’hôte achète le titre sous licence; les autres rejoignent avec l’application de base  
- Catalogue en expansion de classiques gratuits et de titres sous licence  
- Jeu multiplateforme et support multilingue  
- Modes solo, coopératif ou compétitif  
- Learning Hub (espace d’apprentissage) dans chaque jeu  
- Sauvegarde et reprise à tout moment  

{727775900141776}

Jeux inclus :  
- Dames, Go, Échecs et Parcheesi  
- Jeux de cartes français  

Rejoignez d’autres joueurs sur Discord ou Telegram et lancez une partie (pas encore d’adversaires IA).

All On Board! est développé par un studio indépendant animé par la passion du jeu de société, avec des mises à jour régulières et un catalogue en évolution.

{1074388514816063}
nodes.short_description: Conçu pour les passionnés de jeux de société, All On Board! fait revivre la magie des soirées jeux en VR/XR. Profitez de versions adaptées de vos titres préférés entre amis, avec une physique réaliste et un design soigné qui rend chaque partie plus vraie que nature, où que vous soyez.

nodes.long_description:
Creado para quienes aman los juegos de mesa, All On Board! recupera la magia de las noches de juegos.

Las risas, la rivalidad y la tensión antes de una tirada decisiva, ¡todo está en VR/XR! Reúnete con tus amigos alrededor de una mesa que se siente real, sin importar la distancia.

All On Board! te permite disfrutar versiones digitales de tus juegos favoritos. Su biblioteca incluye clásicos gratuitos y títulos con licencia vendidos como DLC (solo el anfitrión necesita el DLC; los demás pueden unirse con la app base).

{1093798885534135}

Cada juego se adapta con cuidado y respeto a sus características especiales. Cada partida y momento compartido cobra vida en el espacio virtual. No se trata de reemplazar la mesa, sino de ampliarla.

{1482797606235589}

- Experiencia VR/XR realista con controles intuitivos  
- Solo el anfitrión compra el DLC; los demás se unen con la app base  
- Biblioteca en expansión con clásicos gratuitos y con licencia  
- Juego multiplataforma y soporte multilingüe  
- Sesiones en solitario, cooperativas o competitivas  
- Learning Hub (centro de aprendizaje) en cada juego  
- Guarda y reanuda partidas en cualquier momento  

{1091117019056443}

Juegos incluidos:  
- Damas, Go, Ajedrez y Parchís  
- Juegos con baraja francesa  

Encuentra otros jugadores en Discord o Telegram y empieza una partida (sin oponentes IA por ahora).

All On Board! está desarrollado por un estudio independiente que ama los juegos tanto como tú, impulsado por la pasión, las actualizaciones y un catálogo en crecimiento.

{1432887354426652}
nodes.short_description: Pensado para los amantes de los juegos de mesa, All On Board! recupera la magia de las noches de juegos en VR/XR. Disfruta de versiones adaptadas de tus títulos favoritos junto a tus amigos, con físicas realistas y un diseño cuidado que hace que cada partida se sienta real, estés donde estés.

nodes.long_description:
Built for people who love board games, All On Board! brings game nights back to life.

The laughter, the rivalry, the quiet focus before a decisive roll, it’s all here in VR/XR. Gather around a virtual table that feels real, no matter how far apart you are.

All On Board! is a tool that lets you enjoy digital versions of the tabletop games you love. The library includes free classics and reknown licensed titles sold separately as DLC (DLC purchase is required only to host, you can join any game with just the base app).

{756860736720817}

Each game is adapted with care and respect for what makes it special. Every shuffle, move, and chaotic moment shared among friends is brought to life in virtual space. This isn’t about replacing the table. It’s about expanding it.

{1266488808465482}

- Lifelike VR/XR tabletop experience with realistic physics and intuitive controls
- Only the host buys the licensed title; others join with the base app
- Growing library of licensed favorites and free classics
- Cross-platform and multi-language support
- Solo, co-op, or competitive sessions
- Learning Hub in every game to help you learn fast
- Save and resume anytime

{1513545693148653}

Classic games included: 

- Checkers, Go, Chess, and Parchisi.
- French deck games.

Find other players in our Discord or Telegram and start a session (no AI opponents yet).

All On Board! is made by an independent studio that loves board games as much as you do. It’s built on passion, constant updates, and a growing lineup of great titles.

{1721994118426414}
nodes.short_description: Built for board game lovers, All On Board! brings back the magic of game nights to VR/XR. Enjoy adapted versions of your favorite titles with friends, lifelike physics, and thoughtful design that make every match feel real, like gathering around a table wherever you are.

nodes.long_description:
All On Board! is a revolutionary tabletop platform built from the ground up specifically for VR, created by and for board game enthusiasts. As the only platform natively built for VR, All On Board! fully exploits the capabilities of virtual reality to deliver an unmatched board gaming experience. This includes predictive selection and positioning of board elements while enjoying realistic physical interactions close to real life. A unique platform that is constantly evolving, both functionally and in its game catalog, packed with beloved franchises among board game enthusiasts.

Experience the joy of discovering new games, just like browsing the latest releases at your favorite store: All On Board! brings you shared moments of discussion, laughter, and nostalgia reminiscent of past adventures and unforgettable games.

Features:

- Only one player is required to purchase game titles: If you own a game, you can invite your friends to play for free, just like in real life
- Experience interactions that are intuitive and naturally immersive
- Top-tier games meticulously adapted for VR, ensuring exceptional gameplay and smooth interactions
- Quickly learn the rules with in-game tutorials and contextual help that provides more information about any component
- Tailored gameplay for 1 to multiple players, including solo and co-op modes. You can even tackle cooperative games on your own!
- Cross-platform support
- Play in your preferred language, with ongoing additions to our language support
nodes.short_description: Designed from the ground up for VR, All On Board! offers seamless board game experiences. Join this ever-evolving platform and connect with fellow board game enthusiasts! Choose your avatar and enjoy playing solo or with friends, diving into some of the most popular board game franchises.
